desc: Leathercosmos, online leather hide store. Shop genuine Italian leather. Upholstery leather, Vegetable tanned leather, Napa Leather, Suede, Ponyskin, Calfskin, Goatskin, Leather scraps and remnants, leather for bagmaking and shoemaking. A solution to all your leather needs.

layout.text: Croco Prints, Snake Prints, Ostrich Prints, Animal Prints, Floral and Camouflage Prints.
